body:
- [x] Switching the coverage reports from coveralls to codecov
  - The codecov interface is cleaner and easier to read/browse.
    - also shows more details clearly (partials, branches, etc.)
  - Can show coverage changes line by line in GitHub with [a browser plugin](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/codecov-extension/keefkhehidemnokodkdkejapdgfjmijf)
- [x] Simplified `.travis.yml`
- [x] Added some tests for `spack graph`

Codecov seems to report lower coverage numbers than coveralls, but that's ok.
title: Use codecov for coverage instead of coveralls
